video.title: The Fall
video.synopsis: When the Belfast police are stalled in their investigation of a spate of murders, Detective Superintendent Stella Gibson is drafted to investigate.

episodes.synopsis: When a murder in Belfast remains unsolved, DSI Stella Gibson is brought in to catch the killer.
episodes.title: Dark Descent

episodes.synopsis: Gibson's worst fears are realized as Spector's murder spree in Belfast continues and a reckless decision has her facing some very real consequences.
episodes.title: Darkness Visible

episodes.synopsis: As Gibson takes control of the hunt for the serial killer striking against women in Belfast, Spector hunts for his next victim.
episodes.title: Insolence & Wine

episodes.synopsis: When Eastwood's investigation into Olson's murder throws open some uncomfortable truths for Burns, Gibson comes under increased pressure.
episodes.title: My Adventurous Song

episodes.synopsis: As the net appears to be closing in, Spector makes a dramatic confession and a decision that binds his fate to Gibson.
episodes.title: The Vast Abyss

episodes.synopsis: Gibson tries to get Spector's surviving victim to remember him; after telling Gibson she'll never catch him, Spector returns to Belfast.
episodes.title: These Troublesome Disguises

episodes.synopsis: Gibson realizes she has inadvertently put Rose's life in danger, and the police desperately search for Rose as Spector continues to roam free.
episodes.title: Night Darkens the Street

episodes.synopsis: Gibson orders extensive surveillance on Spector's family, while Spector invades Gibson's private world and relishes taunting and provoking her.
episodes.title: Beauty Hath Strange Power

episodes.synopsis: Gibson is shocked to discover that Spector has been paying visits to one of his surviving victims in the hospital, and she finally locates him.
episodes.title: The Mind is its Own Place

episodes.synopsis: Spector is under surveillance, but his unpredictability causes problems for Gibson and her team, forcing her to confront the brutality of his crimes.
episodes.title: The Perilous Edge of Battle

episodes.synopsis: Gibson's investigation leads her to Spector's lair. As they finally come face-to-face, both have a chance to look into the eyes of their nemesis.
episodes.title: What Is in Me Dark Illumine
